summary: Senior Software Engineer & Technical Architect with 6+ years of experience building distributed systems, AI-driven SaaS platforms, and high-scale backend services. Deep expertise in Java, TypeScript/Node.js, and cloud-native architectures. Architected and led development of complex multi-service platforms integrating 50+ APIs, real-time data pipelines, and ML/AI inference workloads. Passionate about designing clean systems, optimizing performance, and turning ambiguous business needs into scalable engineering solutions.

experience.role: Co-Founder: Lead Software Engineer & Technical Architect
items: Lead the design, development, and scaling of the Vellora AI Revenue Operating System, an enterprise-grade SaaS platform revolutionizing sales intelligence.
Architect and implement full-cycle software solutions from conception through deployment.
Specialize in AI-powered sales platforms, multi-tenant architectures, and real-time data processing systems.
Developed and customized software solutions including conversions, interfaces, enhancements, and UI modifications.
Handled full-cycle development from analysis to deployment and maintenance.
Proficient in Scala and RESTful APIs, managing complex enhancements with strong attention to detail.
Analyzed, designed, and built a microservices architecture system using Java, Kafka, Akka, Redis, OpenShift, and Docker.
Worked in an Agile setting to investigate and resolve defects alongside functional support.
Utilized AWS, Go, Python, OpenShift, Kubernetes, and Jenkins for deployment and infrastructure.

projects.title: photonLabs
projects.description: A Full-Stack Web Application using the SpringBoot Framework. Features users, friends, groups, and feed functionality. Integrated with Filestack API and MySQL. Solo project demonstrating full-cycle development.

education.degree: Redis | RU101: Introduction to Redis Data Structures
